content: AMA The Fifth Person Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 16 Feb 2019What are your top 5 growth stock picks in US and SG in 2019?What stocks and sectors are you upbeat about in the current political climate?1 answerAnswerBump1

Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Hi,I do not time where the market is going and try to buy into the sector. My investment style is more of a bottom up approach, focusing on finding great business and buy them when opportunity arises. 2 comments0

Leonard Tan18 Feb 2019Hey Victor just curious- are you a believer of efficient-markets hypothesis? If so how do you usually determine a good time to buy in? Eg. after a major selloff, or do you practice dollar cost averaging(DCA) instead?Victor Chng19 Feb 2019Hi Leonard, I am not a believe of EMT, I think market are foolish sometimes which give investor chance to make money. I personally average down on company that I think are good during sell down.
